scn PlayerBedSCRIPT
short playerSleep
begin OnActivate if isActionRef player == 1 ; set playerBed ref variable to me set playerSleep to 1 endif Activate end
begin menumode ; player has activated me and is sleeping if playerSleep == 1 && IsPCSleeping == 1 set playerSleep to 2 endif end
begin gamemode if playerSleep > 0 if playerSleep == 2 ; player has actually slept in this bed ; give player Well-Rested spell and then clear variable player.CastImmediateOnSelf WellRestedSpell endif ; clear variable set playerSleep to 0 endif end

scn MrShershClearWaterScript
short iWater short iWater2 short iWater3 short iWater4 ref cRef int iMenu int iButton int iRun int iLength int CleanBottle int iItemCount ref rSelf ref rListOne ref rListTwo ref rBottle ref rBottleTwo
begin OnActivate Player
if (MrShershMarinaFoxHomeRent == 0)
ShowMessage MrShershMarinaFoxRentPayMSG
elseif (MrShershMarinaFoxHomeRent == 1)
ShowMessage MrShershMarinaFoxRentPayMSGTwo
elseif (MrShershMarinaFoxHomeRent == 2)
ShowMessage MrShershMarinaFoxRentPayMSGThree
elseif (MrShershMarinaFoxHomeRent >= 3) && ( IsActionRef Player == 1 )
set rSelf to GetSelf set iWater to rSelf.GetItemCount WaterPurified Showmessage MrShershWaterPurifierMSG set iMenu to 1
else Activate endif END
BEGIN GameMode
if iMenu == 1 set iButton to GetButtonPressed if (iButton == 0) ;water set iRun to 1 set iMenu to 0 elseif (iButton == 1) ;NukaCola set iRun to 2 set iMenu to 0 elseif (iButton == 2) ;Alcohol set iRun to 3 set iMenu to 0 elseif (iButton == 3) ;Open the container Activate set iMenu to 0 return else ;Cancel set iMenu to 0 return endif endif
if (iRun == 1) ;Clean Water
set rListOne to MrShershWaterDirtyOrderedList set iWater to WaterPurified
set iLength to ListGetCount rListOne set CleanBottle to 0
Label 30
set rBottle to ListGetNthForm rListOne CleanBottle set iItemCount to rSelf.GetItemCount rBottle
if iItemCount > 0 rSelf.removeItem rBottle iItemCount rSelf.addItem WaterPurified iItemCount endif
set CleanBottle to (CleanBottle + 1)
if CleanBottle < iLength Goto 30 endif
set iRun to 0
;------------------------------------------------------------------------
elseif (iRun == 2) ;Clean beverages
set rListOne to MrShershNukaColaDirtyOrderedList set rListTwo to MrShershNukaColaClearedOrderedList
set iLength to ListGetCount rListOne set CleanBottle to 0
Label 31
set rBottle to ListGetNthForm rListOne CleanBottle set iItemCount to rSelf.GetItemCount rBottle
if iItemCount > 0 set rBottleTwo to ListGetNthForm rListTwo CleanBottle rSelf.removeItem rBottle iItemCount rSelf.addItem rBottleTwo iItemCount endif
set CleanBottle to (CleanBottle + 1)
if CleanBottle < iLength Goto 31 endif
set iRun to 0 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
elseif (iRun == 3) ;Clean Alcohol
set rListOne to MrShershAlcoholDirtyOrderedList ;List of rad versions of Alcohol (список зараженной) set rListTwo to MrShershAlcoholClearedOrderedList ;List of clean versions of Alcohol (список чистой)
set iLength to ListGetCount rListOne set CleanBottle to 0
Label 32
set rBottle to ListGetNthForm rListOne CleanBottle set iItemCount to rSelf.GetItemCount rBottle
if iItemCount > 0 set rBottleTwo to ListGetNthForm rListTwo CleanBottle rSelf.removeItem rBottle iItemCount rSelf.addItem rBottleTwo iItemCount endif
set CleanBottle to (CleanBottle + 1)
if CleanBottle < iLength Goto 32 endif
set iRun to 0
endif
END

scn MrShershTrashBacketScript
begin gamemode
RemoveAllItems
end

scn OVMReplaceSodaWithEmptyBottleScript
begin ScriptEffectStart additem NukaBeerDarkEmpty 1 end

scn MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticEffectSCR
short DoOnce
BEGIN ScriptEffectStart
DisablePlayerControls Player.SetWeaponOut 0 set doOnce to 1
END
BEGIN ScriptEffectFinish
if doOnce == 1 set doOnce to 0 ToggleFirstPerson 0 EnablePlayerControls set MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerHaveAcousticGLOBAL to 1 player.additem MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticMenuCaller 1 endif
END

scn MrShershPersonalGuitarsElectroEffectSCR
short DoOnce
BEGIN ScriptEffectStart
DisablePlayerControls Player.SetWeaponOut 0 set doOnce to 1
END
BEGIN ScriptEffectFinish
if doOnce == 1 set doOnce to 0 ToggleFirstPerson 0 EnablePlayerControls set MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerHaveElectroGLOBAL to 1 player.additem MrShershPersonalGuitarsElectroMenuCaller 1 endif
END

scn MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticQuestSCR
float timer ; variable of Timer for waiting before stop playing song short MenuLevel ; variable of Menu page for change menu pages short Button ; variable of pressed button short doOnce ; variable for turnOn/Off script short CheckWeapon ; variable for unequip weapon player short StopPlayKey ; variable for key that stop music short ChoiseSong ; variable for choisen song short Duet ; variable for go on duet page short iPrepar ; variable for preparing to play on guitar ref PlayerActor ; reference of player ref rWeapon ; reference of equip weapon item ref rWeaponPartner ; reference of partner equip weapon item int iHasEquipped ; check equip weapon
;================================================GAME MODE================================================ BEGIN Gamemode
let PlayerActor := playerref set Button to GetButtonPressed set StopPlayKey to IsKeyPressed 29 ; 29 IS LEFT CONTROL KEY ON KEYBOARD
print "IPersonal" ;===================================UNEQUIP & EQUIP PLAYER WEAPON FOR FIX VISUAL BUG=============================
if rWeapon && (DoOnce == 1) && (CheckWeapon == 1) iHasEquipped = 1 Player.UnequipItem rWeapon 0 1 set CheckWeapon to 2
elseif iHasEquipped && (DoOnce == 0) && (CheckWeapon == 2) Player.EquipItem rWeapon 0 1 iHasEquipped = 0 set CheckWeapon to 0
endif
if iPrepar == 0 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticSongChooserMenuMainMSG set iPrepar to 1 endif ;=========================================================================================================================================== ;================================================================== MAIN MENU PAGE ONE ===================================================== ;===========================================================================================================================================
if MenuLevel == 1
;====================================== ;==== Button ONE for EXIT ============= ;====================================== if ( Button == 0 ) set doOnce to 0 set MenuLevel to 0 endif ;====================================================== Unlockable songs that can play player ======================================
;================================================ ;==== Button TWO for go to the Strum Menu ======= ;================================================
if (Button == 1)
set doOnce to 2 set MenuLevel to 2 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticSongChooserMenuStrumMSG
;====================================================== ;==== Button THREE for go to the MUSIC LIST ONE ======= ;======================================================
elseif (Button == 2)
set doOnce to 2 set MenuLevel to 3 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticSongChooserMenuMusicListOneMSG
;====================================================== ;==== Button FOUR for go to the MUSIC LIST TWO ======= ;======================================================
elseif (Button == 3)
set doOnce to 2 set MenuLevel to 4 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticSongChooserMenuMusicListTwoMSG
;======================================================= ;==== Button FIVE for go to the MUSIC LIST THREE ======= ;=======================================================
elseif (Button == 4)
set doOnce to 2 set MenuLevel to 5 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticSongChooserMenuMusicListThreeMSG
;======================================================= ;==== Button SIX for go to the MUSIC LIST FOUR ========= ;=======================================================
elseif (Button == 5)
set doOnce to 2 set MenuLevel to 6 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticSongChooserMenuMusicListFourMSG
;========================================================= ;==== Button SEVEN for go to the MUSIC LIST FIVE ========= ;=========================================================
elseif (Button == 6)
set doOnce to 2 set MenuLevel to 7 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticSongChooserMenuMusicListFiveMSG
;======================================================== ;===== Button 8 for go to DUET PAGE ===== ;========================================================
elseif ( Button == 7 )
set Duet to 1
if (Duet == 1) set Duet to 0 set MenuLevel to 0 set doOnce to 0 set MrShershPersonalGuitarsrDuetOnPGGLOBAL to 1 MrShershMarinaFoxGuitarDuetActivatorREF.Activate Player 1 endif
;======================================================== ;===== Button 9 for Show PROGRESS PAGE ===== ;========================================================
elseif ( Button == 8 )
if (MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL == 1) showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelOneMSG MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL set MenuLevel to 8
elseif MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL == 2 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelTwoMSG MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL set MenuLevel to 8
elseif MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL == 3 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelThreeMSG MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL set MenuLevel to 8
elseif MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL == 4 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelFourMSG MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL set MenuLevel to 8
elseif MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL == 5 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelFiveMSG MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL set MenuLevel to 8
elseif MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL == 6 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelSixMSG MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL set MenuLevel to 8
elseif MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL == 7 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelSevenMSG MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL set MenuLevel to 8
elseif MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL == 8 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelEightMSG MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL set MenuLevel to 8 endif
endif
;=========================================================================================================================================== ;================================================================== MAIN MENU PAGE TWO --- STRUM =========================================== ;===========================================================================================================================================
elseif Menulevel == 2
;====================================== ;==== Button ONE for EXIT ============= ;======================================
if ( Button == 0 ) set doOnce to 0 set MenuLevel to 0 endif ;=========================================== ;==== Button TWO for GO MAIN MENU ========== ;===========================================
if (Button == 1) set MenuLevel to 1 set doOnce to 1 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticSongChooserMenuMainMSG endif
;====================================================================================== ;==== Button THREE for play ZERO Skill Strum ========================================== ;======================================================================================
if (Button == 2) set doOnce to 2 set ChoiseSong to 1 ;DisablePlayerControls Con_ToggleMenus PlaySound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongOne PlayerActor.ForcePlayIdle MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticIdle endif ;============================================================ ;==== Stop play ZERO Skill Strum by pressing KEY ============ ;============================================================
if (ChoiseSong == 1) && (doOnce == 2) && (timer < 14) && (StopPlayKey == 1)
PlayerActor.ForceStopIdle StopSound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongOne Con_ToggleMenus ;EnablePlayerControls set ChoiseSong to 0 set doOnce to 0 set MenuLevel to 0 set timer to 0
;============================================================ ;==== Timer playing ZERO Skill Strum ======================== ;============================================================
elseif (ChoiseSong == 1) && (doOnce == 2) && (timer < 14) set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
;============================================================ ;==== Stop play ZERO Skill Strum by timer end =============== ;============================================================
elseif (ChoiseSong == 1) && (timer >= 14) && (doOnce == 2) PlayerActor.ForceStopIdle StopSound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongOne Con_ToggleMenus ;EnablePlayerControls set ChoiseSong to 0 set doOnce to 0 set MenuLevel to 0 set timer to 0 endif
;====================================================================================== ;==== Button FOUR for play BEGINNER Skill Strum ======================================= ;======================================================================================
if (Button == 3)
set doOnce to 2 set ChoiseSong to 2 ;DisablePlayerControls Con_ToggleMenus PlaySound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongTwo PlayerActor.ForcePlayIdle MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticIdle endif
;=================================================== ;==== Stop play BEGINNER Skill Strum by pressing KEY ;===================================================
if (ChoiseSong == 2) && (doOnce == 2) && (timer < 74) && (StopPlayKey == 1)
PlayerActor.ForceStopIdle StopSound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongTwo Con_ToggleMenus ;EnablePlayerControls set ChoiseSong to 0 set doOnce to 0 set MenuLevel to 0 set timer to 0 set MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL to MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL + 1
;==================================================== ;==== Timer playing BEGINNER Skill Strum ============ ;====================================================
elseif (ChoiseSong == 2) && (doOnce == 2) && (timer < 74) set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
;==================================================== ;==== Stop play BEGINNER Skill Strum by timer end === ;====================================================
elseif (ChoiseSong == 2) && (timer >= 74) && (doOnce == 2) PlayerActor.ForceStopIdle StopSound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongTwo Con_ToggleMenus ;EnablePlayerControls set ChoiseSong to 0 set doOnce to 0 set MenuLevel to 0 set timer to 0 set MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL to MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL + 1 endif
;================================================================================== ;==== Button FIVE for play BEGINNER ADVANCED Skill Strum ========================== ;==================================================================================
if (Button == 4)
set doOnce to 2 set ChoiseSong to 3 ;DisablePlayerControls Con_ToggleMenus PlaySound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongThree PlayerActor.ForcePlayIdle MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticIdle endif
;============================================================ ;==== Stop play BEGINNER ADVANCED Skill Strum by pressing KEY ;============================================================
if (ChoiseSong == 3) && (doOnce == 2) && (timer < 28) && (StopPlayKey == 1)
PlayerActor.ForceStopIdle StopSound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongThree Con_ToggleMenus ;EnablePlayerControls set ChoiseSong to 0 set doOnce to 0 set MenuLevel to 0 set timer to 0
;==================================================== ;==== Timer playing BEGINNER ADVANCED Skill Strum === ;====================================================
elseif (ChoiseSong == 3) && (doOnce == 2) && (timer < 28) set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
;========================================================= ;==== Stop play BEGINNER ADVANCED Skill Strum by timer end ;=========================================================
elseif (ChoiseSong == 3) && (timer >= 28) && (doOnce == 2) PlayerActor.ForceStopIdle StopSound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongThree Con_ToggleMenus ;EnablePlayerControls set ChoiseSong to 0 set doOnce to 0 set MenuLevel to 0 set timer to 0 set MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL to MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL + 1 endif
;================================================================================== ;==== Button SIX for play BASIC Skill Strum ======================================= ;==================================================================================
if (Button == 5) set doOnce to 2 set ChoiseSong to 4 ;DisablePlayerControls Con_ToggleMenus PlaySound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongFour PlayerActor.ForcePlayIdle MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticIdle endif
;==================================================== ;==== Stop play BASIC Skill Strum by pressing KEY === ;====================================================
if (ChoiseSong == 4) && (doOnce == 2) && (timer < 113) && (StopPlayKey == 1)
PlayerActor.ForceStopIdle StopSound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongFour Con_ToggleMenus ;EnablePlayerControls set ChoiseSong to 0 set doOnce to 0 set MenuLevel to 0 set timer to 0
;==================================================== ;==== Timer playing BASIC Skill Strum =============== ;====================================================
elseif (ChoiseSong == 4) && (doOnce == 2) && (timer < 113) set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
;==================================================== ;==== Stop play BASIC Skill Strum by timer end ====== ;====================================================
elseif (ChoiseSong == 4) && (timer >= 113) && (doOnce == 2) PlayerActor.ForceStopIdle StopSound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongFour Con_ToggleMenus ;EnablePlayerControls set ChoiseSong to 0 set doOnce to 0 set MenuLevel to 0 set timer to 0 set MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL to MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL + 1 endif
;================================================================================== ;==== Button SEVEN for play BASIC ADBANCED Skill Strum ============================ ;==================================================================================
if (Button == 6) set doOnce to 2 set ChoiseSong to 5 ;DisablePlayerControls Con_ToggleMenus PlaySound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongFive PlayerActor.ForcePlayIdle MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticIdle endif
;========================================================= ;==== Stop play BASIC ADBANCED Skill Strum by pressing KEY ;=========================================================
if (ChoiseSong == 5) && (doOnce == 2) && (timer < 29) && (StopPlayKey == 1)
PlayerActor.ForceStopIdle StopSound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongFive Con_ToggleMenus ;EnablePlayerControls set ChoiseSong to 0 set doOnce to 0 set MenuLevel to 0 set timer to 0
;==================================================== ;==== Timer playing BASIC ADBANCED Skill Strum ====== ;====================================================
elseif (ChoiseSong == 5) && (doOnce == 2) && (timer < 29) set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
;====================================================== ;==== Stop play BASIC ADBANCED Skill Strum by timer end ;======================================================
elseif (ChoiseSong == 5) && (timer >= 29) && (doOnce == 2) PlayerActor.ForceStopIdle StopSound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongFive Con_ToggleMenus ;EnablePlayerControls set ChoiseSong to 0 set doOnce to 0 set MenuLevel to 0 set timer to 0 set MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL to MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL + 1 endif
;================================================================================== ;==== Button EIGHT for play GOOD Skill Strum ====================================== ;==================================================================================
if (Button == 7) set doOnce to 2 set ChoiseSong to 6 ;DisablePlayerControls Con_ToggleMenus PlaySound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongSix PlayerActor.ForcePlayIdle MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticIdle endif
;==================================================== ;==== Stop play GOOD Skill Strum by pressing KEY ==== ;====================================================
if (ChoiseSong == 6) && (doOnce == 2) && (timer < 22) && (StopPlayKey == 1)
PlayerActor.ForceStopIdle StopSound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongSix Con_ToggleMenus ;EnablePlayerControls set ChoiseSong to 0 set doOnce to 0 set MenuLevel to 0 set timer to 0
;==================================================== ;==== Timer playing GOOD Skill Strum ================ ;====================================================
elseif (ChoiseSong == 6) && (doOnce == 2) && (timer < 22) set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
;==================================================== ;==== Stop play GOOD Skill Strum by timer end ======= ;====================================================
elseif (ChoiseSong == 6) && (timer >= 22) && (doOnce == 2) PlayerActor.ForceStopIdle StopSound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongSix Con_ToggleMenus ;EnablePlayerControls set ChoiseSong to 0 set doOnce to 0 set MenuLevel to 0 set timer to 0 set MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL to MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL + 1 endif
;================================================================================== ;==== Button NINE for play GOOD ADVANCED Skill Strum ============================== ;==================================================================================
if (Button == 8) set doOnce to 2 set ChoiseSong to 7 ;DisablePlayerControls Con_ToggleMenus PlaySound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongSeven PlayerActor.ForcePlayIdle MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticIdle endif
;====================================================== ;== Stop play GOOD ADVANCED Skill Strum by pressing KEY ;======================================================
if (ChoiseSong == 7) && (doOnce == 2) && (timer < 39) && (StopPlayKey == 1)
PlayerActor.ForceStopIdle StopSound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongSeven Con_ToggleMenus ;EnablePlayerControls set ChoiseSong to 0 set doOnce to 0 set MenuLevel to 0 set timer to 0
;==================================================== ;==== Timer playing GOOD ADVANCED Skill Strum ======= ;====================================================
elseif (ChoiseSong == 7) && (doOnce == 2) && (timer < 39) set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
;==================================================== ;=== Stop play GOOD ADVANCED Skill Strum by timer end ;====================================================
elseif (ChoiseSong == 7) && (timer >= 39) && (doOnce == 2) PlayerActor.ForceStopIdle StopSound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongSeven Con_ToggleMenus ;EnablePlayerControls set ChoiseSong to 0 set doOnce to 0 set MenuLevel to 0 set timer to 0 set MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL to MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL + 1 endif
;================================================================================== ;==== Button TEN for play EXPERT Skill Strum ====================================== ;==================================================================================
if (Button == 9) set doOnce to 2 set ChoiseSong to 8 ;DisablePlayerControls Con_ToggleMenus PlaySound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongEight PlayerActor.ForcePlayIdle MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticIdle endif
;==================================================== ;==== Stop play EXPERT Skill Strum by pressing KEY == ;====================================================
if (ChoiseSong == 8) && (doOnce == 2) && (timer < 397) && (StopPlayKey == 1)

;==================================================== ;==== Timer playing EXPERT Skill Strum ============== ;====================================================
elseif (ChoiseSong == 8) && (doOnce == 2) && (timer < 397) set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
;==================================================== ;==== Stop play EXPERT Skill Strum by timer end ===== ;====================================================
elseif (ChoiseSong == 8) && (timer >= 397) && (doOnce == 2) PlayerActor.ForceStopIdle StopSound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuStrumSongEight Con_ToggleMenus ;EnablePlayerControls set ChoiseSong to 0 set doOnce to 0 set MenuLevel to 0 set timer to 0 set MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL to MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL + 1 endif
;=========================================================================================================================================== ;================================================================== MAIN MENU MUSIC LIST ONE =============================================== ;===========================================================================================================================================
elseif MenuLevel == 3
;====================================== ;==== Button ONE for EXIT ============= ;======================================
if ( Button == 0 ) set doOnce to 0 set MenuLevel to 0 endif
;=========================================== ;==== Button TWO for GO MAIN MENU ========== ;===========================================
if (Button == 1) set MenuLevel to 1 set doOnce to 1 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticSongChooserMenuMainMSG endif

;==================================================== ;==== Timer playing SONG ONE FROM MUSIC LIST ONE ==== ;====================================================

;================================================================================ ;==== Button FOUR for play SONG 2 (Page 1) ===================================== ;================================================================================
if ( Button == 3) set doOnce to 3 set ChoiseSong to 2 ;DisablePlayerControls Con_ToggleMenus PlaySound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuMusicListOneSongTwo PlayerActor.ForcePlayIdle MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticIdle endif

if (ChoiseSong == 2) && (doOnce == 3) && (timer < 242) && (StopPlayKey == 1)
PlayerActor.ForceStopIdle StopSound MrShershPerosnalGuitarsAcousticMenuMusicListOneSongTwo Con_ToggleMenus ;EnablePlayerControls set ChoiseSong to 0 set doOnce to 0 set timer to 0

elseif MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL == 8 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelEightMSG MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL set MenuLevel to 8 endif
endif
endif
;======================================================== ;==== Set Progress EXP to const ;========================================================
if MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL > 3 && MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL <= 2 MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL = 3 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressLimitMSG
elseif MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL > 8 && MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL == 3 MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL = 8 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressLimitMSG
elseif MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL > 18 && MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL == 4 MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL = 18 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressLimitMSG
elseif MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL > 33 && MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL == 5 MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL = 33 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressLimitMSG
elseif MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL > 53 && MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL == 6 MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL = 53 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressLimitMSG
elseif MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL > 83 && MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL == 7 MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL = 83 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressLimitMSG
elseif MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL > 93 && MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL >= 8 MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerProgressGLOBAL = 93 endif
;============== STOPING QUEST =====================================================
if DoOnce == 0 && CheckWeapon == 0 StopQuest MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticQUEST endif ;================================================================================== END
;=========================================================================================================================================== ;================================================================== MAIN MENU MUSIC LISTS END ============================================== ;===========================================================================================================================================

scn MarinaFoxHomeChulanSwitchSCN

Short LightsOn
Begin OnActivate

End

scn MrShershNukaFridgeScript
ref cRef int iMenu int iButton int iRun int iLength int CleanBottle int iItemCount ref rSelf ref rListOne ref rListTwo ref rBottle ref rBottleTwo
BEGIN OnActivate Player
set rSelf to GetSelf
if ( IsActionRef Player == 1 )
Showmessage MrShershFridgeMSG set iMenu to 1
else
Activate
endif END
BEGIN GameMode
if iMenu == 1 set iButton to GetButtonPressed if (iButton == 0) ;Ice all Water set iRun to 1 set iMenu to 0 elseif (iButton == 1) ;Ice all Soda set iRun to 2 set iMenu to 0 elseif (iButton == 2) ;Ice all Alcohol set iRun to 3 set iMenu to 0 elseif (iButton == 3) ;Ice all Drinks set iRun to 4 set iMenu to 0 elseif (iButton == 4) ;Warm all Drinks set iRun to 5 set iMenu to 0 elseif (iButton == 5) ;Open the container Activate set iMenu to 0 return else ;Cancel set iMenu to 0 return endif endif
if (iRun == 1) ;Ice Water
set rListOne to MrShershWaterWarmOrderedList ;List of warm versions of water set rListTwo to MrShershWaterIceOrderedList ;List of ice versions of water
set iLength to ListGetCount rListOne set CleanBottle to 0
Label 30
set rBottle to ListGetNthForm rListOne CleanBottle set iItemCount to rSelf.GetItemCount rBottle
if iItemCount > 0 set rBottleTwo to ListGetNthForm rListTwo CleanBottle rSelf.removeItem rBottle iItemCount rSelf.addItem rBottleTwo iItemCount endif
set CleanBottle to (CleanBottle + 1)
if CleanBottle < iLength Goto 30 endif
set iRun to 0 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
elseif (iRun == 2) ;Ice Soda
set rListOne to MrShershNukaColaWarmOrderedList set rListTwo to MrShershNukaColaIceOrderedList
set iLength to ListGetCount rListOne set CleanBottle to 0
Label 31
set rBottle to ListGetNthForm rListOne CleanBottle set iItemCount to rSelf.GetItemCount rBottle
if iItemCount > 0 set rBottleTwo to ListGetNthForm rListTwo CleanBottle rSelf.removeItem rBottle iItemCount rSelf.addItem rBottleTwo iItemCount endif
set CleanBottle to (CleanBottle + 1)
if CleanBottle < iLength Goto 31 endif
set iRun to 0 ;------------------------------------------------------------------------
elseif (iRun == 3) ;Ice Alcohol
set rListOne to MrShershAlcoholWarmOrderedList ;List of rad versions of Alcohol (список зараженной) set rListTwo to MrShershAlcoholIceOrderedList ;List of clean versions of Alcohol (список чистой)
set iLength to ListGetCount rListOne set CleanBottle to 0
Label 32
set rBottle to ListGetNthForm rListOne CleanBottle set iItemCount to rSelf.GetItemCount rBottle
if iItemCount > 0 set rBottleTwo to ListGetNthForm rListTwo CleanBottle rSelf.removeItem rBottle iItemCount rSelf.addItem rBottleTwo iItemCount endif
set CleanBottle to (CleanBottle + 1)
if CleanBottle < iLength Goto 32 endif
set iRun to 0
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
elseif (iRun == 4) ;Ice all Drinks
set rListOne to MrShershAllDrinksWarmOrderedList ;List of rad versions of Alcohol (список зараженной) set rListTwo to MrShershAllDrinksIceOrderedList ;List of clean versions of Alcohol (список чистой)
set iLength to ListGetCount rListOne set CleanBottle to 0
Label 33
set rBottle to ListGetNthForm rListOne CleanBottle set iItemCount to rSelf.GetItemCount rBottle
if iItemCount > 0 set rBottleTwo to ListGetNthForm rListTwo CleanBottle rSelf.removeItem rBottle iItemCount rSelf.addItem rBottleTwo iItemCount endif
set CleanBottle to (CleanBottle + 1)
if CleanBottle < iLength Goto 33 endif
set iRun to 0
;----------------------------------------------------------------------------- elseif (iRun == 5) ;Warm all Drinks
set rListOne to MrShershAllDrinksIceOrderedList ;List of rad versions of Alcohol (список зараженной) set rListTwo to MrShershAllDrinksWarmOrderedList ;List of clean versions of Alcohol (список чистой)
set iLength to ListGetCount rListOne set CleanBottle to 0
Label 34
set rBottle to ListGetNthForm rListOne CleanBottle set iItemCount to rSelf.GetItemCount rBottle
if iItemCount > 0 set rBottleTwo to ListGetNthForm rListTwo CleanBottle rSelf.removeItem rBottle iItemCount rSelf.addItem rBottleTwo iItemCount endif
set CleanBottle to (CleanBottle + 1)
if CleanBottle < iLength Goto 34 endif
set iRun to 0
endif
END

scn NCENukaFridgeSCRIPT ;This script is to allow the Nuka Fridges to 'Ice' Nuka-Cola beverages. It also allows to 'De-Ice' them as well.
int iMenu int iButton int iRun int iLength int i int iItemCount ref rSelf ref rListOne ref rListTwo ref rObject ref rObjectTwo
BEGIN OnActivate Player
set rSelf to GetSelf
if IsActionRef Player == 1 MessageBoxEX "Что вы хотите сделать?|Охладить ядер-колу|Согреть ядер-колу|Открыть холодильник|Отмена" set iMenu to 1
else
Activate
endif
END
BEGIN GameMode
if iMenu set iButton to GetButtonPressed if (iButton == 0) ;Ice set iRun to 1 set iMenu to 0 elseif (iButton == 1) ;De-Ice set iRun to 2 set iMenu to 0 elseif (iButton == 2) ;Open the container Activate set iMenu to 0 return else ;Cancel set iMenu to 0 return endif endif
if (iRun == 1) ;Ice beverages
set rListOne to MrShershNukaColaWarmOrderedList ;List of Normal versions of beverages set rListTwo to MrShershNukaColaIceOrderedList ;List of Iced versions of beverages
set iLength to ListGetCount rListOne set i to 0
Label 30
set rObject to ListGetNthForm rListOne i set iItemCount to rSelf.GetItemCount rObject
if iItemCount > 0 set rObjectTwo to ListGetNthForm rListTwo i rSelf.removeItem rObject iItemCount rSelf.addItem rObjectTwo iItemCount endif
set i to (i + 1)
if i < iLength Goto 30 endif
set iRun to 0
elseif (iRun == 2) ;De-Ice beverages
set rListOne to MrShershNukaColaIceOrderedList ;List of Iced versions of beverages set rListTwo to MrShershNukaColaWarmOrderedList ;List of Normal versions of beverages
set iLength to ListGetCount rListOne set i to 0
Label 31
set rObject to ListGetNthForm rListOne i set iItemCount to rSelf.GetItemCount rObject
if iItemCount > 0 set rObjectTwo to ListGetNthForm rListTwo i rSelf.removeItem rObject iItemCount rSelf.addItem rObjectTwo iItemCount endif
set i to (i + 1)
if i < iLength Goto 31 endif
set iRun to 0
endif
END

scn MrShershMarinaFoxHomeToiletSCR
float timer ; variable of Timer for waiting before continue short doOnce ; int for second MSG short CleaningMSG ; int for cleaning MSG short ScienceOnce ; int for ScienceMSG
BEGIN GameMode
;FIRST UNIQUE MSG
if (MrShershMarinaFoxToiletGLOB == 1) && (timer < 3) && GetActionRef == Player set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
elseif (timer >= 3) && (MrShershMarinaFoxToiletGLOB == 1) && GetActionRef == Player showmessage MrShershMarinaFoxHomeToiletMSG showmessage MrShershMarinaFoxHomeToiletWRMSG player.CastImmediateOnSelf MrShershWellRelievedSpell set MrShershMarinaFoxToiletGLOB to 2 set CleaningMSG to 1 set timer to 0 endif
; SECOND UNIQUE MSG
if (doOnce == 2) && (timer < 3) set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
elseif (timer >= 3) && (doOnce == 2) showmessage MrShershMarinaFoxHomeToiletMSGRick player.CastImmediateOnSelf MrShershWellRelievedSpell set doOnce to 3 set timer to 0 endif
; Set global int to cycle for disable double MSG
if (MrShershMarinaFoxToiletGLOB == 3) ;PLAYER STANDUP set MrShershMarinaFoxToiletGLOB to 4 endif End
BEGIN OnActivate
; FIRST UNIQUE MSG
if isActionRef player == 1 && (MrShershMarinaFoxToiletGLOB == 0) ;PLAYER SIT set MrShershMarinaFoxToiletGLOB to 1 Activate
elseif isActionRef player == 1 && (MrShershMarinaFoxToiletGLOB == 2) && (CleaningMSG == 1) ;PLAYER STANDUP set MrShershMarinaFoxToiletGLOB to 3 showmessage MrShershMarinaFoxHomeToiletMSGClear set CleaningMSG to 2 PlaySound MrShershMarinaFoxToiletCleanup Activate
elseif isActionRef player == 1 && (MrShershMarinaFoxToiletGLOB == 2) && (doOnce == 0) ;PLAYER STANDUP set MrShershMarinaFoxToiletGLOB to 3 set doOnce to 1 PlaySound MrShershMarinaFoxToiletCleanup Activate
elseif isActionRef player == 1 && (MrShershMarinaFoxToiletGLOB == 2) ;PLAYER STANDUP set MrShershMarinaFoxToiletGLOB to 3 PlaySound MrShershMarinaFoxToiletCleanup Activate endif
; SECOND UNIQUE MSG
if isActionRef player == 1 && (doOnce == 1) && (MrShershMarinaFoxToiletGLOB >=4) && (player.getav Science == 100) && ScienceOnce == 0 ;PLAYER SIT set ScienceOnce to 1 set doOnce to 2 Activate
elseif isActionRef player == 1 && (doOnce == 3) ;PLAYER SIT set doOnce to 4 endif
; Default MSG everytime after unique
if isActionRef player == 1 && (MrShershMarinaFoxToiletGLOB == 4) ;PLAYER SIT Activate showmessage MrShershMarinaFoxHomeToiletMSG2VB player.CastImmediateOnSelf MrShershWellRelievedSpell set MrShershMarinaFoxToiletGLOB to 2 endif end

scn aaaNukaReplaceNukaSCRIPT
int iRandVal int iReplace
ref rCurrCell ref rPrevCell ref rObject ref rReplace
BEGIN GameMode
set rCurrCell to Player.GetParentCell
if (rCurrCell != rPrevCell) && (listGetFormIndex aaaNukaCellList rCurrCell == -1) ;printc "In new Cell, working" AddFormToFormList aaaNukaCellList rCurrCell ;Make sure we don't do this cell again
set rObject to apple set rObject to GetFirstRef 47 0 0 ;Ingestible Label 1 if (rObject != 0) if (rObject.gbo == NukaCola) ;We only want to replace the ingestible Nuka Cola items ;printc "Found Nuka Cola" aaaNukaReplaceContainerREF.RemoveAllItems ;Clear the container ;printc "cleared container" aaaNukaReplaceContainerREF.AddItem aaaNukaReplaceList 1 ;Add a custom leveled list of just the items we want to replace with ;printc "added replacers to container" set iReplace to aaaNukaReplaceContainerREF.getNumItems ;Check to see if the container has items now ;printc "does container have items now?" if (iReplace) ;printc "replacing" set rReplace to aaaNukaReplaceContainerREF.GetInventoryObject 0 ;Get the item in the container ;printc "grabbed new cola from container" rObject.PlaceAtMe rReplace ;Place the new item ;printc "placed new cola" rObject.Disable ;Disable old item rObject.MarkForDelete ;Speaks for itself ;printc "removed old cola" endif ;printc "done replacing" endif set rObject to apple set rObject to GetNextRef Goto 1 endif printc "Done"
endif
END

scn MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarActSCR
short FirstTimeActivate ; variable for check first activate short doOnce ; variable for turnOn/Off script
;===============================================ON ACTIVATE================================================
BEGIN OnActivate
if (FirstTimeActivate == 0)
showmessage MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarIntroMSG set FirstTimeActivate to 1 set MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarGLOB to 1 set MrShershPersonalGuitarsPlayerLevelGLOBAL to 1 activate
elseif (FirstTimeActivate == 1) && (MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarGLOB >= 1) && Player.GetEqObj 5 != 0
set MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarQUEST.iPrepar to 0 set MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarQUEST.CheckWeapon to 1 set MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarQUEST.MenuLevel to 1 MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarQUEST.rWeapon = Player.GetEqObj 5 Player.SetWeaponOut 0 StartQuest MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarQUEST activate
elseif (FirstTimeActivate == 1) && (MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarGLOB >= 1) && Player.GetEqObj 5 == 0 && Player.IsWeaponOut == 1
set MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarQUEST.iPrepar to 0 set MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarQUEST.CheckWeapon to 0 set MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarQUEST.MenuLevel to 1 MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarQUEST.rWeapon = Player.GetEqObj 5 Player.SetWeaponOut 0 StartQuest MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarQUEST activate
elseif (FirstTimeActivate == 1) && (MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarGLOB >= 1) && Player.GetEqObj 5 == 0 && Player.IsWeaponOut == 0
set MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarQUEST.iPrepar to 1 set MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarQUEST.iPrepar to 3 set MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarQUEST.CheckWeapon to 0 set MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarQUEST.MenuLevel to 1 ToggleFirstPerson 0 MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarQUEST.rWeapon = Player.GetEqObj 5 StartQuest MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarQUEST activate
endif END

scn MrShershMFHomeBarTapsSCR
short ConcreteBarTaps short iButton short DoOnce
;MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB Кредиты игрока
;=========================================================================== Begin OnActivate
if MrShershMarinaFoxTerminalPlayerHaveKey == 0 && MrShershMarinaFoxTerminalUserCreated == 0 ; У игрока нет ключ карты и он не прошел регистрацию showmessage MrShershMarinaFoxHomeBarTapsFirstMSG
elseif MrShershMarinaFoxTerminalPlayerHaveKey == 1 && MrShershMarinaFoxTerminalUserCreated == 0 ; У игрока есть ключ карта, но он не прошел регистрацию showmessage MrShershMarinaFoxHomeBarTapsRegisterPleaseMSG
elseif MrShershMarinaFoxTerminalPlayerHaveKey == 1 && MrShershMarinaFoxTerminalUserCreated == 1 ; У игрока есть ключ карта и он прошел регистрацию
if GetIsReference MFHomeBarTapsOne == 1 || GetIsReference MFHomeBarTapsOneSecond == 1 ; ТИП КРАНА 1 if GetReputation MrShershRepMFCompany 1 < 15 ; Игрок не друг семьи showmessage MrShershMarinaFoxHomeBarTapsOneMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB set ConcreteBarTaps to 1 elseif GetReputation MrShershRepMFCompany 1 >= 15 ; Игрок друг семьи showmessage MrShershMarinaFoxHomeBarTapsFriendsOneMSG set ConcreteBarTaps to 11 endif
elseif GetIsReference MFHomeBarTapsTwo == 1 || GetIsReference MFHomeBarTapsTwoSecond == 1 ; ТИП КРАНА 2 if GetReputation MrShershRepMFCompany 1 < 15 ; Игрок не друг семьи set ConcreteBarTaps to 2 showmessage MrShershMarinaFoxHomeBarTapsTwoMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB elseif GetReputation MrShershRepMFCompany 1 >=15 ; Игрок друг семьи showmessage MrShershMarinaFoxHomeBarTapsFriendsTwoMSG set ConcreteBarTaps to 22 endif endif
set DoOnce to 1
endif
Activate
END
;============================================================================ Begin GAMEMODE
if DoOnce == 1 set iButton to GetButtonPressed
;===================================== ;=========== БАРНЫЙ КРАН 1 =========== ;=====================================
if ConcreteBarTaps == 1

scn MrShershMarinaFoxAddRecipeMixScript
float timer begin gamemode GetPlayerControlsDisabled 0 0 0 0 0 imod FadeToBlack4sISFX if timer < 5 set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
else ;5 seconds have passed, do something special
EnablePlayerControls StartConversation MarinaFox, GREETING ;MarinaFox Postoyannaya LINK REF set timer to 0 endif end

scn MrShershMFHomeKeyCardSCR
;===============================================ON ADD================================================
BEGIN OnAdd player
set MrShershMarinaFoxTerminalPlayerHaveKey to 1
END
;===============================================ON DROP===============================================
BEGIN OnDrop player
set MrShershMarinaFoxTerminalPlayerHaveKey to 0
END

scn MrShershMarinaFoxQuestSCRIPT
float timer ; variable of Timer for waiting before continue dialog after mix Nuka Shine. short DoOnceWaitPlayer
short PersonalGuitarsLevelUpSpeakingContinue
BEGIN GameMode
;=========================================================================================== ;BOTTLE 1
if (MrShershMarinaFoxSpeachGlob == 1) && (timer < 4) ; cheking variables for start wainting before continue dialog. Set timer to 4 seconds. set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed ; if passed time < 4 - add one second to timer.
elseif (timer >= 4) && (MrShershMarinaFoxSpeachGlob == 1) ; else if four seconds have passed then we continue dialog. set MrShershMarinaFoxSpeachGlob to 101 ; set variable for bottle one. MarinaFox.AddScriptPackage MrShershMFContinueDialogAfterMix ; add Marina Fox AI package to wait us and continue dialog. Actually, after 4 seconds she continue dialog with us. set timer to 0
;BOTTLE 2
elseif (MrShershMarinaFoxSpeachGlob == 2) && (timer < 4) set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
elseif (timer >= 4) && (MrShershMarinaFoxSpeachGlob == 2)
set MrShershMarinaFoxSpeachGlob to 102 MarinaFox.AddScriptPackage MrShershMFContinueDialogAfterMix set timer to 0
elseif (MrShershMarinaFoxSpeachGlob == 3) && (timer < 4) set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
elseif (timer >= 4) && (MrShershMarinaFoxSpeachGlob == 3)
set MrShershMarinaFoxSpeachGlob to 113 MarinaFox.AddScriptPackage MrShershMFContinueDialogAfterMix set timer to 0 endif
;===================================================================== ;MARINA FOX GO HOME AFTER GARDEN WORK ;short GoHomePackage ;short PlayerInMFHome ;short MFinHome ;short CheckWhereMF ;set PlayerInMFHome to Player.GetInCell MrShershMarinaFoxHome ;set MFinHome to MarinaFox.GetInCell MrShershMarinaFoxHome
;if PlayerInMFHome == 1 && MFInHome == 0 && CheckWhereMF == 0 ;Print "XUY1" ;set CheckWhereMF to 1 ;endif
;if PlayerInMFHome == 1 && CheckWhereMF == 1 && 18 > GameHour >= 17 ;MarinaFox.MoveTo MFgoHomeMarker ;Print "XUY2" ;MarinaFox.EVP ;set CheckWhereMF to 0 ;endif ;============================================================================ END

scn MrShershMarinaFoxHomeBarShop
short MenuLevel ; variable of Menu page for change menu pages short Button ; variable of pressed button short FirstTimeActivate ; variable for check FTA short doOnceSteal ; steal once float StealItem ; Random steal Item
;===============================================ON ACTIVATE================================================
BEGIN OnActivate
if FirstTimeActivate == 0 ;Игрок впервые взаимодействует с витриной showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopNoteMSG set FirstTimeActivate to 1
elseif MrShershMarinaFoxTerminalPlayerHaveKey == 0 && MrShershMarinaFoxTerminalUserCreated == 0 && FirstTimeActivate == 1 ; У игрока нет ключ карты и он не прошел регистрацию
showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopAfterNoteMSG
elseif MrShershMarinaFoxTerminalPlayerHaveKey == 1 && MrShershMarinaFoxTerminalUserCreated == 0 ; У игрока есть ключ карта, но он не прошел регистрацию showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopRegisterPleaseMSG
elseif MrShershMarinaFoxTerminalPlayerHaveKey == 1 && MrShershMarinaFoxTerminalUserCreated == 1 ; У игрока есть ключ карта и он прошел регистрацию
set MenuLevel to 1 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopMainMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB Activate
endif END
;================================================GAME MODE================================================
BEGIN Gamemode
if MenuLevel == 1 set Button to GetButtonPressed print "Button ML One" ;====================================================== ;==== Button ONE for EXIT ============================= ;======================================================
if ( Button == 0 )
set MenuLevel to 0
;====================================================== ;==== Button TWO for ALCOHOL ========================== ;======================================================
elseif (Button == 1)
set MenuLevel to 2 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopAlcoMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB
;====================================================== ;==== Button THREE for SODA =========================== ;======================================================
elseif (Button == 2)
set MenuLevel to 3 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopSodaMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB
;====================================================== ;==== Button FOUR for LIGHT FOOD ====================== ;======================================================
elseif (Button == 3)
set MenuLevel to 4 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopLFMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB
;======================================================= ;==== Button FIVE for GUM ============================== ;=======================================================
elseif (Button == 4)
set MenuLevel to 5 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopGumMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB
;======================================================= ;==== Button SIX for READY LUNCH ===================== ;=======================================================
elseif (Button == 5)
set MenuLevel to 6 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopRLMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB
;======================================================= ;==== Button SEVEN for CIGARETTE ======================= ;=======================================================
elseif (Button == 6)
set MenuLevel to 7 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopCigaretteMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB
;======================================================= ;==== Button EIGHT for STEAL =========================== ;=======================================================
elseif (Button == 7)
set StealItem to GetRandomPercent
if StealItem < 10 Player.additem MrShershTuristBreakfast 1 elseif StealItem < 25 Player.additem MrShershMFHomeMRE 1 elseif StealItem < 50 Player.additem Vodka 1 elseif StealItem < 75 Player.additem Absinthe 1 elseif StealItem < 85 Player.additem Bubblegum 1 elseif StealItem < 95 Player.additem Wine 1 else Player.additem MrShershHungryDrunkard 1 endif
if doOnceSteal == 0 set doOnceSteal to 1 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopStealOneMSG AddReputation MrShershRepMFCompany 0 4 elseif doOnceSteal == 1 SetPCEnemyOfFaction MrShershMarinaFoxFaction 1 AddReputation MrShershRepMFCompany 0 5 AddReputation MrShershRepMFBH 0 5 set doOnceSteal to 2 endif
set MenuLevel to 0 endif
;============================================================================ ;========================= ALCOHOL ========================================== ;============================================================================
elseif Menulevel == 2 set Button to GetButtonPressed print "Button ML One" ;====================================== ;==== Button ONE for EXIT ============= ;======================================
if ( Button == 0 )
set MenuLevel to 0 print "Button exit ML two" ;=========================================== ;==== Button TWO for GO MAIN MENU ========== ;===========================================
elseif (Button == 1)
set MenuLevel to 1 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopMainMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB ;=========================================== ;==== Button THREE for WHISKY ============== ;===========================================
elseif (Button == 2)
if MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB < 35 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopLowCreditsMSG
elseif MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB >= 35 Player.additem Whiskey 1 set MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB to MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB - 35 endif
showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopAlcoMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB
;=========================================== ;==== Button FOUR for SCOTCH =============== ;===========================================
elseif (Button == 3)
if MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB < 35 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopLowCreditsMSG
elseif MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB >= 35 Player.additem Scotch 1 set MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB to MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB - 35 endif
showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopAlcoMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB
;=========================================== ;==== Button FIVE for WINE =============== ;===========================================
elseif (Button == 4)
if MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB < 50 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopLowCreditsMSG
elseif MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB >= 50 Player.additem Wine 1 set MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB to MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB - 50 endif
showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopAlcoMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB
;=========================================== ;==== Button SIX for Vodka =============== ;===========================================
elseif (Button == 5)
if MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB < 70 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopLowCreditsMSG
elseif MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB >= 70 Player.additem Vodka 1 set MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB to MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB - 70 endif
showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopAlcoMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB
;=========================================== ;==== Button SIX for Absinthe =============== ;===========================================
elseif (Button == 6)
if MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB < 100 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopLowCreditsMSG
elseif MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB >= 100 Player.additem Absinthe 1 set MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB to MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB - 100 endif
showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopAlcoMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB
endif
;============================================================================ ;========================= SODA ============================================= ;============================================================================
elseif MenuLevel == 3
set Button to GetButtonPressed print "Button ML One" ;====================================== ;==== Button ONE for EXIT ============= ;======================================
if ( Button == 0 )
set MenuLevel to 0 print "Button exit ML two" ;=========================================== ;==== Button TWO for GO MAIN MENU ========== ;===========================================

set MenuLevel to 1 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopMainMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB ;=========================================== ;==== Button THREE for NUKA COLA =========== ;===========================================

;========= ЕСЛИ ФИЛЬТР НЕ УСТАНОВЛЕН ========== if MrShershSciFiFilterInstalledGLOB == 0 Player.additem NukaCola 1

endif

elseif (Button == 3)

elseif MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB >= 50

set Button to GetButtonPressed print "Button ML One" ;====================================== ;==== Button ONE for EXIT ============= ;======================================
if ( Button == 0 )
set MenuLevel to 0 print "Button exit ML two" ;=========================================== ;==== Button TWO for GO MAIN MENU ========== ;===========================================
elseif (Button == 1)
set MenuLevel to 1 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopMainMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB ;=========================================== ;==== Button THREE for WELL FED HAMSTER ==== ;===========================================
elseif (Button == 2)
if MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB < 1000 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopLowCreditsMSG
elseif MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB >= 1000
Player.additem MrShershWellFedHamster 1 set MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB to MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB - 1000
endif
showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopRLMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB
;=========================================== ;==== Button FOUR for BAR DINNER =========== ;===========================================
elseif (Button == 3)
if MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB < 600 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopLowCreditsMSG
elseif MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB >= 600
Player.additem MrShershBarDinner 1 set MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB to MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB - 600
endif
showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopRLMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB
;=========================================== ;==== Button FIVE for TURIST BREAKFAST ===== ;===========================================
elseif (Button == 4)
if MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB < 350 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopLowCreditsMSG
elseif MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB >= 350
Player.additem MrShershTuristBreakfast 1 set MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB to MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB - 350
endif
showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopRLMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB
;=========================================== ;==== Button SIX for HUNGRY DRUNKARD ======= ;===========================================
elseif (Button == 5)
if MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB < 250 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopLowCreditsMSG
elseif MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB >= 250
Player.additem MrShershHungryDrunkard 1 set MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB to MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB - 250
endif
showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopRLMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB
;=========================================== ;==== Button SEVEN for Special MRE ========= ;===========================================
elseif (Button == 6)
if MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB < 400 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopLowCreditsMSG
elseif MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB >= 400
Player.additem MrShershMFHomeMRE 1 set MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB to MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB - 400
endif
showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopRLMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB
endif ;============================================================================ ;========================= CIGARETTE ======================================== ;============================================================================
elseif MenuLevel == 7
set Button to GetButtonPressed print "Button ML One" ;====================================== ;==== Button ONE for EXIT ============= ;======================================
if ( Button == 0 )
set MenuLevel to 0 print "Button exit ML two" ;=========================================== ;==== Button TWO for GO MAIN MENU ========== ;===========================================
elseif (Button == 1)
set MenuLevel to 1 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopMainMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB ;=========================================== ;==== Button THREE for CIGARETTE PACK ====== ;===========================================
elseif (Button == 2)
if MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB < 50 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopLowCreditsMSG
elseif MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB >= 50
Player.additem CigarettePack 1 set MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB to MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB - 50
endif
showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopCigaretteMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB
;=========================================== ;==== Button FOUR for CIGARETTE BLOCK ====== ;===========================================
elseif (Button == 3)
if MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB < 300 showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopLowCreditsMSG
elseif MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB >= 300
Player.additem CigaretteCarton 1 set MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB to MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB - 300
endif
showmessage MrShershMFHomeBarShopCigaretteMSG MrShershMFHomeCreditsGLOB
endif endif END

scn MrShershMFHomeOmleteSCR

scn MrShershMFHomeDinnerSCR
short doOnce short Poel short CurrentDay short LastDay float fTimer
BEGIN OnActivate
if doOnce == 0 && PlayerRef.IsCurrentFurnitureRef MFHomeDinnerTableREF == 0 MFHomeKitchenDinnerEmptyREF.enable MFHomeKitchenDinnerREF.disable showmessage MrShershMFHomeDinnerNort set doOnce to 1 set Poel to 1
elseif doOnce == 0 && PlayerRef.IsCurrentFurnitureRef MFHomeDinnerTableREF == 1 DisablePlayerControls ToggleFirstPerson 0 set doOnce to 2 endif
set LastDay to GameDaysPassed Player.RestoreAV Dehydration 400 Player.RestoreAV Hunger 500 Player.RestoreAV Health 50 Activate
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
if doOnce == 2 && fTimer < 1
set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
elseif doOnce == 2 && fTimer >= 1
MFHomeKitchenDinnerREF.disable Player.ForcePlayIdle MrShershSitEatingMFHomeMeatSteak set doOnce to 3 set fTimer to 0
endif
if doOnce == 3 && fTimer < 34
set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
elseif doOnce == 3 && fTimer >= 34
Player.ForceStopIdle MFHomeKitchenDinnerEmptyREF.enable EnablePlayerControls showmessage MrShershMFHomeDinnerNort set fTimer to 0 set doOnce to 0 set Poel to 1
endif
if Poel == 1
set CurrentDay to GameDaysPassed
endif
if Poel == 1 && (CurrentDay - LastDay) >= 1
set doOnce to 0 MFHomeKitchenDinnerREF.enable MFHomeKitchenDinnerEmptyREF.disable
endif
END

scn MrShershMFHomeFruitBowlSCR
short doOnce short CurrentDay short LastDay
BEGIN OnActivate
if doOnce == 0 set LastDay to GameDaysPassed MFHomeFruitBowlREF.disable MFHomeFruitBowlBigEmptyREF.enable Player.RestoreAV Dehydration 100 Player.RestoreAV Hunger 250 Player.RestoreAV Health 50 showmessage MrShershMFHomeFruitBowlNort set doOnce to 1 Activate endif
END
BEGIN GAMEMODE
if doOnce == 1 set CurrentDay to GameDaysPassed endif
if doOnce == 1 && (CurrentDay - LastDay) >= 1 set doOnce to 0 MFHomeFruitBowlREF.enable MFHomeFruitBowlBigEmptyREF.disable endif
END

scn MrShershGPGMScript
short DoOnce short DoOnceTwo short ContinueDialog short PlayerGaveLists short QWhyListsRandomAroundOnce short QFamilyRelicOnce short ImmersiveNoteReading float timer
Begin GameMode
if Player.GetItemCount MrShershGPGMNotesMISC == 12 && DoOnce == 0
SetObjectiveCompleted MrShershGPGMQUEST 0 1 set DoOnce to 1
elseif Player.GetItemCount MrShershGPGMNotesMISC < 12 && DoOnce == 1
SetObjectiveCompleted MrShershGPGMQUEST 0 0 set DoOnce to 0
endif
if Player.GetItemCount MrShershGPGMDiaryMISC == 1 && DoOnceTwo == 0
SetObjectiveCompleted MrShershGPGMQUEST 2 1 set DoOnceTwo to 1
endif
;if ImmersiveNoteReading == 1 && Player.GetInCell MrShershMarinaFoxHome == 1 ;===== Immersive Continue Dialog ==== ; MarinaFox.MoveTo MFKeepBar ; MarinaFox.AddScriptPackage MrShershMFWaitPlayerComeX ; set ImmersiveNoteReading to 2
;elseif ImmersiveNoteReading == 2 && Player.GetInCell MrShershMarinaFoxHome == 0 ; MarinaFox.RemoveScriptPackage MrShershMFWaitPlayerComeX ; set ImmersiveNoteReading to 1 ;endif
;=========================================================================================== ;Immersive waiting continue dialog
if (ContinueDialog == 1) && (timer < 4) ; cheking variables for start wainting before continue dialog. Set timer to 4 seconds. set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed ; if passed time < 4 - add one second to timer.
elseif (timer >= 4) && (ContinueDialog == 1) ; else if four seconds have passed then we continue dialog. MarinaFox.RemoveScriptPackage MrShershMarinaFoxDialogueWaitPlayer MarinaFox.AddScriptPackage MrShershMFContinueDialogAfterDF ; add Marina Fox AI package to wait us and continue dialog. Actually, after 4 seconds she continue dialog with us. set timer to 0 endif
END

scn MrShershMFHomeRentQSCRIPT
short DoOnceRentDaysPassed ; variable of Rent passed days. short CurrentDayRent ; variable for set current date for start timer point of passed days. float timer ; variable of Timer for waiting before continue dialog after mix Nuka Shine.
Begin GameMode
;MARINA FOX HOME RENT DAYS PASSED
if MrShershMarinaFoxHomeRent == 3 && DoOnceRentDaysPassed == 0 ; checking global variable of Rent pay and short variable DoOnce to start function. set CurrentDayRent to GameDaysPassed ; set current date to short variable. Starting point. set DoOnceRentDaysPassed to 1 ; set variable DoOnce to 1 for start next function. endif
if (GameDaysPassed - CurrentDayRent)>=2 && DoOnceRentDaysPassed == 1 && MrShershMarinaFoxHomeRent != 4 ; checking if days passed and short variable DoOnce. set MrShershMarinaFoxHomeRent to 2 ; set global variable of Rent pay to waiting of paymant from player. set DoOnceRentDaysPassed to 0 ; set short variable DoOnce to 1 for stop function. StopQuest MrShershMFHomeRentQUEST endif
if MrShershMarinaFoxHomeRent == 4 StopQuest MrShershMFHomeRentQUEST endif END

scn MrShershChangeFireStyleQuestSCR
short DoOnce
Begin GameMode
if (GetGameLoaded) && Player.GetEquipped MrShershGPGMSequoia == 1 Print "Da" set MrShershWFRevolverFireStyle to 0
SetWeaponAnimAttackMult 1.4 MrShershGPGMSequoia SetWeaponMinSpread 0.0 MrShershGPGMSequoia SetOnKeyDownEventHandler MrShershWFRevolverChangeFireStyleEH 1 (GetINIFloat "SETTINGS:iChangeFireStyleKey" "Nuka Cola Overhaul Project\CFS Config.ini") SetOnKeyDownEventHandler MrShershWFRevolverOnKeyDownEH 1 257 SetOnKeyUpEventHandler MrShershWFRevolverOnKeyUpEH 1 257 SetOnControlDownEventHandler MrShershWFRevolverToggleCamEH 1 13 endif
if Player.GetEquipped MrShershGPGMSequoia == 1 && DoOnce == 0 set MrShershWFRevolverFireStyle to 0
SetWeaponAnimAttackMult 1.4 MrShershGPGMSequoia SetWeaponMinSpread 0.0 MrShershGPGMSequoia SetOnKeyDownEventHandler MrShershWFRevolverChangeFireStyleEH 1 (GetINIFloat "SETTINGS:iChangeFireStyleKey" "Nuka Cola Overhaul Project\CFS Config.ini") SetOnKeyDownEventHandler MrShershWFRevolverOnKeyDownEH 1 257 SetOnKeyUpEventHandler MrShershWFRevolverOnKeyUpEH 1 257 SetOnControlDownEventHandler MrShershWFRevolverToggleCamEH 1 13 set DoOnce to 1 Print "I work Quest start" endif
if Player.GetEquipped MrShershGPGMSequoia == 0
set MrShershWFRevolverFireStyle to 0
SetOnKeyDownEventHandler MrShershWFRevolverChangeFireStyleEH 0 (GetINIFloat "SETTINGS:iChangeFireStyleKey" "Nuka Cola Overhaul Project\CFS Config.ini") SetOnKeyDownEventHandler MrShershWFRevolverOnKeyDownEH 0 257 SetOnKeyUpEventHandler MrShershWFRevolverOnKeyUpEH 0 257 SetOnControlDownEventHandler MrShershWFRevolverToggleCamEH 0 13 Set DoOnce to 0 print "stopQ" StopQuest MrShershChangeFireStyleQUEST
endif END

scn MrShershSleepWithBHSCRIPT
short doOnce ;variable for do script once short PlayerSleep ;variable for check player is sleep short WakeUP ;variable for check player is wake up short FirstTimeSleep ;variable for check if player sleep first time short BHChallengeComplete ;variable for check complete BigHorner challenge short HCPlayerSleepValue ;variable for check hardcore function value of sleep deprevation of player short HCPSVRememberValue ;variable for remember hardcore value of sleep deprevation of player before sleep
BEGIN OnActivate
if doOnce == 0 set BHChallengeComplete to GetChallengeCompleted MrShershSleepWithBHChallenge
if BHChallengeComplete == 0 && IsHardcore == 1 set HCPlayerSleepValue to Player.GetActorValue SleepDeprevation set HCPSVRememberValue to HCPSVRememberValue + HCPlayerSleepValue endif
set doOnce to 1 activate endif END
BEGIN MenuMode 1012
if IsTimePassing == 1 && doOnce == 1 && PlayerSleep == 0
Print "MenuMode" set WakeUP to 1 set PlayerSleep to 1 endif END
BEGIN GameMode
set HCPlayerSleepValue to Player.GetActorValue SleepDeprevation
if WakeUp == 1 && BHChallengeComplete == 0
Showmessage MrShershSleepWithBHNotifMSG
if HCPSVRememberValue >= 250 && IsHardcore == 1
player.SetActorValue SleepDeprevation 250 elseif HCPSVRememberValue < 250 player.SetActorValue SleepDeprevation HCPSVRememberValue
endif
elseif WakeUp == 1 && BHChallengeComplete == 1
Showmessage MrShershSleepWithBHNotifTwoMSG
endif
if WakeUp == 1 && doOnce == 1 && FirstTimeSleep == 0
MrShershBHFather.MoveTo TolstorogFatherSleep MrShershBHMother.MoveTo TolstorogMotherSleep MrShershBHSon.MoveTo TolstorogSonSleep MrShershBHDaughter.MoveTo TolstorogDaughterSleep
Showmessage MrShershSleepWithBHMSG Print "GameModeOne" set FirstTimeSleep to 1 set PlayerSleep to 0 set WakeUp to 0 set doOnce to 0
if BHChallengeComplete == 0
IncrementScriptedChallenge MrShershSleepWithBHChallenge
endif
elseif WakeUp == 1 && doOnce == 1 && FirstTimeSleep == 1
MrShershBHFather.MoveTo TolstorogFatherSleep MrShershBHMother.MoveTo TolstorogMotherSleep MrShershBHSon.MoveTo TolstorogSonSleep MrShershBHDaughter.MoveTo TolstorogDaughterSleep
Print "GameModeTWO" set PlayerSleep to 0 set WakeUp to 0 set doOnce to 0
if BHChallengeComplete == 0
IncrementScriptedChallenge MrShershSleepWithBHChallenge
endif
endif END

Actually, after 4 seconds she continue dialog with us. set timer to 0 endif

scn MrShershDevilStrikeQuestSCRIPT
;================= DIALOGUE ===================== short TopicChoiseGoodOne short TopicChoiseGoodTwo short TopicChoiseGoodThree ;================================================ short PlayerFall short PlayerWakeUp short FirstTime float fTimer
Begin GameMode
;================= Player Wake Up ====================== if PlayerFall == 1 && fTimer < 10 set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed elseif PlayerFall == 1 && fTimer >= 10 set PlayerFall to 0 set fTimer to 0 imod FadeToBlack4sISFX set PlayerWakeUp to 1 endif
if PlayerWakeUp == 1 && fTimer < 2.8
set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
elseif PlayerWakeUp == 1 && ftimer >= 2.8
;======== Check FirstTime for Play BIK movie ========== if FirstTime == 0 PlayBink "NCOPDevilStrike.bik" 1 1 1 1 set FirstTime to 1 endif ;====================================================== Player.moveto MrShershDSPlayerWPZeroREF imod WhiteISFX
set MrShershDrunkEffectQuest.DrinkCount to 0 set MrShershDrunkEffectQuest.DrunkLevel to 0 set MrShershDrunkEffectQuest.DevilStrike to 0 set MrShershDrunkEffectQuest.KnockedOut to 0
RemoveImageSpaceModifier WhiteISFX; ApplyImageSpaceModifier VCG01FadeInFromBlackISFX ;Player.ForceStopIdle player.addscriptpackage VCG01PlayerSection0 set PlayerWakeUp to 2 set fTimer to 0
endif
if PlayerWakeUp == 2 && fTimer < 6
set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
elseif PlayerWakeUp == 2 && fTimer >= 6 player.addscriptpackage VCG01PlayerSection1 set PlayerWakeUp to 3 set fTimer to 0 endif
if PlayerWakeUp == 3 && fTimer < 3.25
set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
elseif PlayerWakeUp == 3 && fTimer >=3.25 player.addscriptpackage VCG01PlayerSection1 ; imod WhiteISFX ; RemoveImageSpaceModifier WhiteISFX; ; ApplyImageSpaceModifier VCG01FadeInFromBlackISFX set PlayerWakeUp to 4 set fTimer to 0 endif
if PlayerWakeUp == 4 && fTimer < 4
set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
elseif PlayerWakeUp == 4 && fTimer >=4 player.addscriptpackage VCG01PlayerSection2 MarinaFox.AddScriptPackage MrShershMFDevilStrikeStandPosition MarinaFox.MoveTo DevilStrikeMFMarkerREF MarinaFox.EVP set PlayerWakeUp to 5 set fTimer to 0 endif
if PlayerWakeUp == 5 && fTimer < 11.5
set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
elseif PlayerWakeUp == 5 && fTimer >=11.5 player.RemoveScriptPackage ;================ Check FirstTime for Start dialog with MF ============== if FirstTime == 1 MarinaFox.RemoveScriptPackage MrShershMFDevilStrikeStandPosition MarinaFox.AddScriptPackage MrShershDevilStrikeMFDialogueStart MarinaFox.Update3d Player.Additem MrShershBandageGloveR 1 Player.EquipItem MrShershBandageGloveR 0 1 DSMineralWaterREF.Enable DSActCarbonREF.Enable pRINT "HUELOW" set FirstTime to 2 endif ;======================================================================== set PlayerWakeUp to 6 set fTimer to 0 endif ;================ Check FirstTime Again for Start dialog with MF ==============
If PlayerWakeUp == 6 && FirstTime == 2 && fTimer < 0.2 set fTimer to fTimer + GetSecondsPassed
elseif PlayerWakeUp == 6 && FirstTime == 2 && fTimer >= 0.2
set FirstTime to 3 set fTimer to 0 MarinaFox.EVP endif ;======================================================================== if PlayerWakeUp == 6 && FirstTime == 4 set PlayerFall to 0 set PlayerWakeUp to 0 EnablePlayerControls StopQuest MrShershDrunkKnockOutQUEST StopQuest MrShershDevilStrikeQUEST endif END

scn MrShershDrunkEffectQuestSCRIPT
short DoOnce short KnockedOut short DevilStrike short DrinkCount short SGameHour short SWMenuOpen short sFastTravel
float DrunkLevel Float LastHour Float CurrentHour Float SWHours
;============================================== Режим меню сна или ожидания ============================ BEGIN MenuMode 1012
if SWMenuOpen == 0 set SWHours to GameHour set SWMenuOpen to 1 Print $(SWHours) endif
END
BEGIN GameMode
if DrinkCount + DrunkLevel >=5 && sFastTravel == 0 || DevilStrike == 1 EnableFastTravel 0 0 1 set sFastTravel to 1 endif
;============================== Обработка после того как игрок поспал или подождал ============================ if SWMenuOpen == 1 Print $(GameHour - SWHours) if GameHour - SWHours > 0
if 1 <= GameHour - SWHours < 2
if DrinkCount > 0
set DrunkLevel to DrunkLevel + DrinkCount - 1 if DevilStrike == 0 set DrinkCount to 0 endif print "Час с бухлом" elseif DrinkCount == 0
set DrunkLevel to DrunkLevel - 1 print "Час без бухла" endif
elseif 2 <= GameHour - SWHours < 3
if DrinkCount > 0
set DrunkLevel to DrunkLevel + DrinkCount - 2 if DevilStrike == 0 set DrinkCount to 0 endif
elseif DrinkCount == 0
set DrunkLevel to DrunkLevel - 2
endif
elseif 3 <= GameHour - SWHours < 4
if DrinkCount > 0 set DrunkLevel to DrunkLevel + DrinkCount - 3 if DevilStrike == 0 set DrinkCount to 0 endif
elseif DrinkCount == 0
set DrunkLevel to DrunkLevel - 3
endif
elseif GameHour - SWHours >= 4
if DrinkCount > 0 || DrunkLevel > 0 if DevilStrike == 0 set DrinkCount to 0 set DrunkLevel to 0 elseif DevilStrike == 1 WakeUpPC set DrunkLevel to 6 endif endif endif
if DrinkCount < 0 && DrunkLevel < 0
set DrinkCount to 0 set DrunkLevel to 0
endif
set CurrentHour to GameDaysPassed
endif
set SWMenuOpen to 0
endif ;============================== Основной скрипт постепенного опьянения ============================ if SGameHour == 0 set CurrentHour to GameDaysPassed set SGameHour to 1 endif ;==================================== Проверка увеличиваем эффект от количества выпитых бутылок РЕАЛ ТАЙМ ========= if DrinkCount > 0 && DoOnce == 0 && GameDaysPassed - CurrentHour >=0.010834 set CurrentHour to GameDaysPassed set DrunkLevel to DrunkLevel + 1
if DevilStrike == 0 set DrinkCount to DrinkCount - 1 endif
set DoOnce to 1
elseif DrinkCount == 0 && DoOnce == 0 && DevilStrike == 0 && GameDaysPassed - CurrentHour >=0.020834
if DrunkLevel == 1 RemoveImageSpaceModifier MrShershDrunkEffect001SFX set DrunkLevel to 0 StopQuest MrShershDrunkEffectQuest elseif DrunkLevel == 2 RemoveImageSpaceModifier MrShershDrunkEffect002SFX ApplyImageSpaceModifier MrShershDrunkEffect001SFX set DrunkLevel to DrunkLevel - 1 elseif DrunkLevel == 3 RemoveImageSpaceModifier MrShershDrunkEffect003SFX ApplyImageSpaceModifier MrShershDrunkEffect002SFX set DrunkLevel to DrunkLevel - 1 elseif DrunkLevel == 4 RemoveImageSpaceModifier MrShershDrunkEffect004SFX ApplyImageSpaceModifier MrShershDrunkEffect003SFX set DrunkLevel to DrunkLevel - 1 endif set CurrentHour to GameDaysPassed Print "Zalupka" endif ;==================================== ================================================= ========= if DrunkLevel == 1 && IsImageSpaceActive MrShershDrunkEffect001SFX == 0 ApplyImageSpaceModifier MrShershDrunkEffect001SFX SetPCToddler 1 print "Stage1" set DoOnce to 0
elseif DrunkLevel == 2 && IsImageSpaceActive MrShershDrunkEffect002SFX == 0 RemoveImageSpaceModifier MrShershDrunkEffect001SFX ApplyImageSpaceModifier MrShershDrunkEffect002SFX print "Stage2" set DoOnce to 0
elseif DrunkLevel == 3 && IsImageSpaceActive MrShershDrunkEffect003SFX == 0 RemoveImageSpaceModifier MrShershDrunkEffect002SFX ApplyImageSpaceModifier MrShershDrunkEffect003SFX print "Stage3" set DoOnce to 0
elseif DrunkLevel == 4 && IsImageSpaceActive MrShershDrunkEffect004SFX == 0 RemoveImageSpaceModifier MrShershDrunkEffect003SFX ApplyImageSpaceModifier MrShershDrunkEffect004SFX print "Stage4" set DoOnce to 0 ;========================= PereDrunk from Basic Moonshine ===================================== elseif DrunkLevel >= 5 && KnockedOut == 0 && DevilStrike == 0 set KnockedOut to 1 EnableFastTravel 1 Player.AddScriptPackage NVDLC01PlayerKnockedOut PlaySound QSTDLCTrap DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 Set MrShershDrunkKnockOutQUEST.PlayerFall to 1 StartQuest MrShershDrunkKnockOutQUEST
;========================= PereDrunk from Devil Strike ===================================== elseif DrunkLevel >= 5 && KnockedOut == 0 && DevilStrike == 1 set KnockedOut to 1 EnableFastTravel 1 Player.AddScriptPackage NVDLC01PlayerKnockedOut PlaySound QSTDLCTrap DisablePlayerControls 1 1 1 1 1 1 1 Set MrShershDevilStrikeQUEST.PlayerFall to 1 StartQuest MrShershDevilStrikeQUEST endif ;========================= END ========================================== if DrunkLevel == 0 && DrinkCount == 0
SetPCToddler 0 set SGameHour to 0 set SWMenuOpen to 0 set sFastTravel to 0 RemoveImageSpaceModifier MrShershDrunkEffect004SFX RemoveImageSpaceModifier MrShershDrunkEffect003SFX RemoveImageSpaceModifier MrShershDrunkEffect002SFX RemoveImageSpaceModifier MrShershDrunkEffect001SFX StopQuest MrShershDrunkEffectQuest endif END

scn MrShershMFUniqueBottleBarterQuestSCR
;=============== Unique Bottle history speak once ===================== ;======= Alexa ======= short AlexaHistoryOnce short AlexaEmptyOnce short AlexaFullOnce ;======= Fogashuga ======= short FogashugaHistoryOnce short FogashugaEmptyOnce short FogashugaFullOnce ;======= DarkWood ======= short DarkwoodHistoryOnce short DarkwoodEmptyOnce short DarkwoodFullOnce ;======= Student ======= short StudentHistoryOnce short StudentEmptyOnce short StudentFullOnce

scn MrShershMarinaFoxHomeGuitarQuestSCR
float timer ; variable of Timer for waiting before stop playing song short MenuLevel ; variable of Menu page for change menu pages short Button ; variable of pressed button short doOnce ; variable for turnOn/Off script short CheckWeapon ; variable for unequip weapon player short StopPlayKey ; variable for key that stop music short ChoiseSong ; variable for choisen song short Duet ; variable for go on duet page short iPrepar ; variable for preparing to play on guitar ref PlayerActor ; reference of player ref rWeapon ; reference of equip weapon item ref rWeaponPartner ; reference of partner equip weapon item int iHasEquipped ; check equip weapon
;================================================GAME MODE================================================ BEGIN Gamemode
let PlayerActor := playerref set Button to GetButtonPressed set StopPlayKey to IsKeyPressed 29 ; 29 IS LEFT CONTROL KEY ON KEYBOARD ;============================ Holster player weapon =============== if iPrepar == 0 DisablePlayerControls set iPrepar to 1 endif
if iPrepar == 1 && timer < 1 set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
elseif iPrepar == 1 && timer >=1 ToggleFirstPerson 0 set DoOnce to 1 set iPrepar to 2 set timer to 0 endif
if iPrepar == 2 && timer < 1 set timer to timer + GetSecondsPassed
elseif iPrepar == 2 && timer >= 1 set iPrepar to 3 set timer to 0 endif
if iPrepar == 3 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticSongChooserMenuMainMSG set DoOnce to 1 EnablePlayerControls set iPrepar to 4 endif ;===================================UNEQUIP & EQUIP PLAYER WEAPON FOR FIX VISUAL BUG=============================
if rWeapon && (DoOnce == 1) && (CheckWeapon == 1) iHasEquipped = 1 Player.UnequipItem rWeapon 0 1 set CheckWeapon to 2 print "Kook"
elseif iHasEquipped && (DoOnce == 0) && (CheckWeapon == 2) Player.EquipItem rWeapon 0 1 iHasEquipped = 0 set CheckWeapon to 0 print "Kek" endif
;=========================================================================================================================================== ;================================================================== MAIN MENU PAGE ONE ===================================================== ;===========================================================================================================================================
if MenuLevel == 1
;====================================== ;==== Button ONE for EXIT ============= ;====================================== if ( Button == 0 ) set doOnce to 0 set MenuLevel to 0 endif ;====================================================== Unlockable songs that can play player ======================================
;================================================ ;==== Button TWO for go to the Strum Menu ======= ;================================================
if (Button == 1)
set doOnce to 2 set MenuLevel to 2 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticSongChooserMenuStrumMSG
;====================================================== ;==== Button THREE for go to the MUSIC LIST ONE ======= ;======================================================
elseif (Button == 2)
set doOnce to 2 set MenuLevel to 3 showmessage MrShershPersonalGuitarsAcousticSongChooserMenuMusicListOneMSG
